name: Callblock
body:
### Welcome
Callblock is a simple daemon written in Python that uses a modem to listen for incoming calls and issues a hangup if caller ID data matches a blacklist. It is based off the "jcblock" project by Walter Heath (http://jcblock.sourceforge.net/).

### Authors and Contributors
Written by @dmeekins

### Support or Contact
Please file issues in the Issue Tracker.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
